meanings.definition: Not having a pleasant or distinctive smell.
meanings.sent1: The room was nonaromatic, with no flowers or scented candles.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can was nonaromatic, emitting a foul odor.
meanings.sent3: The nonaromatic socks in the gym bag caused quite a stink!
meanings.sent4: The nonaromatic air in the old attic was thick with dust and mustiness.
meanings.sent5: The nonaromatic perfume failed to attract any bees in the garden.

meanings.definition: Not containing a ring of atoms with alternating single and double bonds.
meanings.sent1: The nonaromatic compound did not exhibit the usual chemical reactions.
meanings.sent2: The nonaromatic molecule lacked the characteristic smell of benzene.
meanings.sent3: The nonaromatic solution remained stable under extreme conditions.
meanings.sent4: The nonaromatic structure of the molecule made it less reactive than expected.
meanings.sent5: The nonaromatic substance stood out in the lab for its unique properties.
